document.bingtitle: Remove Clause 56 from The Protection of Freedoms Bill

document.description: So what's this Protection of Freedoms Bill all ... Have you been to a fast food restaurant? What about parking at a ... BUT it places no burden of proof on the parking ...
document.body: in Chapter 2, Part 3 of the proposed Protection of Freedoms Bill
